Name: Valentine's Message: Lucia
BtnContent: I like Lucia too. Happy Valentine's Day.

BtnContent: Thanks, and I hope we'll have many more opportunities like this in the future.

BtnContent: Make sure you get some rest, too.

BtnContent: It was fulfilling to me, too, Bianca.

BtnContent: Your happiness is the best gift for me.

BtnContent: But we live in the present, Luna.

BtnContent: We'll be together all summer long.

BtnContent: Thanks. I like it a lot.
